response.original_title: Blazing Trail: A Journey of the Indian Revolution
response.overview: A documentary that follows the underground Communist Party of India (Marxist-Leninist) (People's War) between its first and second congresses, and documents the struggles it undertakes.
response.tagline: A Journey from the 1st Congress to the 2nd Congress of CPI/ML(PW)
response.title: Blazing Trail: A Journey of the Indian Revolution
